11  bool Robot::GetRobotInfoHandler(cpr_robot::GetRobotInfo::Request &req, cpr_robot::GetRobotInfo::Response &res)
12  {
13  res.Model=get_ModelName();
14  res.CountJoints=(uint32_t)m_CountJoints;
15  return true;
16  }
17 
22  bool Robot::GetJointInfoHandler(cpr_robot::GetJointInfo::Request &req, cpr_robot::GetJointInfo::Response &res)
23  {
24  if(req.JointId<m_CountJoints)
25  {
26  res.JointName=m_pJoints[req.JointId]->get_JointName();
27  res.JointType=0;
28  return true;
29  }
30  else
31  {
32  return false;
33  }

35  }

51  // \brief Constructs an instance of the Robot class.
52  // \param countJoints The number of joints of the robot.
53  Robot::Robot(size_t countJoints) :
54  m_CountJoints(countJoints),
55  m_Bus("can0")
56  {
57  m_ModelName="Unknown Model";
58  m_pJoints=new Joint*[countJoints];
59  for(size_t i=0;i<m_CountJoints;i++)
60  m_pJoints[i]=new Joint(m_Bus,(unsigned int)(i+1));
61  m_JointStatePublisher=m_Node.advertise<sensor_msgs::JointState>("/joint_states", 50);
62  m_RobotStatePublisher=m_Node.advertise<cpr_robot::RobotState>("/robot_state",50);
63  m_GetRobotInfoServer=m_Node.advertiseService("/GetRobotInfo",&Robot::GetRobotInfoHandler, this);
64  m_GetJointInfoServer=m_Node.advertiseService("/GetJointInfo",&Robot::GetJointInfoHandler, this);
65  m_RobotCommandServer=m_Node.advertiseService("/RobotCommand",&Robot::RobotCommandHandler, this);
66  m_Override=0.25;
67  }
68 
73  bool Robot::RobotCommandHandler(cpr_robot::RobotCommand::Request &req, cpr_robot::RobotCommand::Response &res)
74  {
75  switch(req.CommandId)
76  {
77  default:
78  ROS_ERROR("Received invalid command from %s: %ui",req.Sender.c_str(),req.CommandId);
79  return false;
80  case COMMAND_OVERRIDE:
81  ROS_INFO("COMMAND_OVERRIDE from %s. Override=%lf%%",req.Sender.c_str(),100.0*req.PayloadFloat);
82  m_Override=req.PayloadFloat;
83  return true;
84  case COMMAND_CONNECT:
85  ROS_INFO("COMMAND_CONNECT from %s.",req.Sender.c_str());
86  for(uint32_t i=0;i<m_CountJoints;i++)
87  m_pJoints[i]->Start();
88  m_Bus.Start();
89  return true;
90  case COMMAND_DISCONNECT:
91  ROS_INFO("COMMAND_DISCONNECT from %s.",req.Sender.c_str());
92  for(uint32_t i=0;i<m_CountJoints;i++)
93  m_pJoints[i]->Stop();
94  m_Bus.Stop();
95  return true;
96  case COMMAND_ENABLE:
97  ROS_INFO("COMMAND_ENABLE from %s.",req.Sender.c_str());
98  for(size_t i=0;i<m_CountJoints;i++)
99  m_pJoints[i]->EnableMotor();
100  return true;
101  case COMMAND_DISABLE:
102  ROS_INFO("COMMAND_DISABLE from %s.",req.Sender.c_str());
103  for(size_t i=0;i<m_CountJoints;i++)
104  m_pJoints[i]->DisableMotor();
105  return true;
106  case COMMAND_STARTREFERENCING:
107  ROS_INFO("COMMAND_STARTREFERENCING from %s.",req.Sender.c_str());
108  for(size_t i=0;i<m_CountJoints;i++)
109  m_pJoints[i]->StartReferencing();
110  return true;
111  case COMMAND_SETZERO:
112  ROS_INFO("COMMAND_SETZERO from %s.",req.Sender.c_str());
113  for(size_t i=0;i<m_CountJoints;i++)
114  m_pJoints[i]->SetZero();
115  return true;
116  }
117  }
118 
120  Robot::~Robot()
121  {
122  for(size_t i=0;i<m_CountJoints;i++)
123  delete m_pJoints[i];
124  delete[] m_pJoints;
125  }

129  void Robot::set_Override(const double override)
130  {
131  m_Override=override;
132  }
133 
136  double Robot::get_Override() const
137  {
138  return m_Override;
139  }
140 
142  void Robot::PublishState()
143  {
144  sensor_msgs::JointState joint_states;
145  joint_states.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
146  m_JointStatePublisher.publish(joint_states);
147  for(size_t i=0;i<m_CountJoints;i++)
148  m_pJoints[i]->PublishState(joint_states);
149  m_JointStatePublisher.publish(joint_states);
150  cpr_robot::RobotState robot_state;
151  robot_state.Header.stamp=ros::Time::now();
152  robot_state.Override=m_Override;
153  robot_state.StatusFlags=0;
154  for(size_t i=0;i<m_CountJoints;i++)
155  {
156  robot_state.StatusFlags|=(uint32_t)m_pJoints[i]->get_ErrorFlags();
157  robot_state.StatusFlags|=((uint32_t)(m_pJoints[i]->get_IsReferenced()?1:0))<<(16+i);
158  }
159  if(!m_Bus.get_IsConnected())
160  robot_state.StatusFlags|=STATUSFLAG_DISCONNECTED;
161  m_RobotStatePublisher.publish(robot_state);
162  }
163 
167  double Robot::get_MaxPosition(const size_t jointId) const
168  {
169  assert(jointId<m_CountJoints);
170  return m_pJoints[jointId]->get_MaxPosition();
